## Basic features of titles

:::{.columns}
:::{.column}
**Good title**
- Short
- Informative
- Jargon-less
- Wide
- Keywords
:::

:::{.column}
**Bad Title**
- Long
- Over informative
- Too specialized
- Narrow
- Non-keywords
:::
:::
